main event: An unidentified flying object was detected on radar over the Atlantic Ocean near Puerto Rico on November 8, 1964, and observed visually by the aircraft commander.
interesting points: The object was reported to have been circular in shape, approximately 1/2 mile in diameter., The radar indicated the object was traveling at a high rate of speed, estimated at 10,000 MPH., Ground and airborne radar tracked the object for about 21 minutes., No known aircraft or other objects matched the characteristics of the radar contact., Visibility conditions were reported to be clear during the sighting.
